column1: Little Goat Diner////Have you ever been able to eat at the Little Goat's?  YOu'll simply amazed by it!  Today I had a fortunately created handmade tortille with some kind of special filling that was specific to The Little Goat's.  It was out of this world!  You will always find just what you are looking for at the little goats' at the Littlest Goat.
